alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 31 at 10:54AM CDT until June 01 at 2:20AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas...Missouri... Indian Creek at Stateline Road Leawood affecting Jackson and Johnson KS Counties. Tomahawk Creek at Roe Avenue Overland Park affecting Johnson KS County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Indian Creek at Stateline Road Leawood. * WHEN...From this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Water begins to cover the portion of Lee Boulevard located south of Interstate 435. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
